response.original_title: 緊縛麻薬捜査官SPECIAL ～救出まで2時間、私は絶対に諦めない～
response.overview: Yamagishi, an investigator who has carried out numerous missions by making full use of good looks and intellect, is captured by an evil organization and is a prey to aphrodisiac and bondage blame! ■ From the first bondage to the back binding, the tortoise shell binding, one-legged hanging, the vibe fixing blame with the rope and no adjustment! Pleasure increases and cums! The hidden masochism of a pure beauty blooms in the consciousness of being stunned by rope sickness. Don't miss the appearance of Aika Yamagishi's white skin digging into the rough hemp rope and writhing in shame and pleasure!
response.tagline: Exclusive Aika Yamagishi finally lifts the ban on bondage!
response.title: S&M Narcotics Investigation Squad Special - It'll Be 2 Hours Until I'm Rescued, So I'm Never Going To Give Up - Aika Yamagishi
